blog.heading: How to install Visual Studio Code in Ubuntu 18.04?
description: The easiest way to install Ubuntu based distributions is to download and install the .deb package (64-bit) either through the graphical software center if it's available or through the command line with:

$ sudo dpkg -i code_1.25.1-1531323788_amd64.deb 
$ sudo apt-get install -f # Install dependencies
Installing the .deb package will automatically install the apt repository and signing key to enable auto-updating using the regular system mechanism.
